mapper.select:
select r.resNo,s.shopname, group_concat(concat(m.menuName,rm.resMenuCnt,'개') separator ' , ') as menuName, r.resDate, r.payPrice, p.PayType, u.uiName, u.uiHP, h.seatCnt, r.hallNo , r.currentStatus from user_info u, reservation r, reservationmenu rm, pay_category p, shop s, menu m, hall h where r.shopNo=#{shopNo} and u.uiNo=r.uiNo and r.resNo=rm.resNo and p.PayCaNo=r.PayCaNo and s.shopNo=r.shopNo and rm.menuNo=m.menuNo and r.hallNo=h.hallNo group by r.resNo order by r.resNo desc
Limit ${snum}, ${enum}

select count(1) from (select r.resNo,s.shopname, group_concat(concat(m.menuName,rm.resMenuCnt,'개') separator ' , ') as menuName, r.resDate, r.payPrice, p.PayType, u.uiName, u.uiHP, h.seatCnt, r.hallNo , r.currentStatus from user_info u, reservation r, reservationmenu rm, pay_category p, shop s, menu m, hall h where r.shopNo=#{shopNo} and u.uiNo=r.uiNo and r.resNo=rm.resNo and p.PayCaNo=r.PayCaNo and s.shopNo=r.shopNo and rm.menuNo=m.menuNo and r.hallNo=h.hallNo group by r.resNo order by r.resNo desc) adminResTotCnt
